sense.def:
Criticism
je izraz neodobravanja nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: Some fierce public criticism of the plan had been voiced.

sense.def:
Criticism of a book, play, or other work of art
je resno preučevanje in ocena neke knjige, igre ali umetnine.

A criticism
je komentar, v katerem povemo, da ima nekaj določeno napako.

seg.quote: One of the main criticisms against him is that he is lazy.
